profile.description: I am in charge of a refrigerator, I have been working in the meat/commercial sector for 7 years and 1 year ago I began to train as a web developer at Coder House. Since I was a child, I have been passionate about technology and challenges. I am currently in looking for my first job in the world of programming to continue growing as a professional Responsible - Proactive - Positive attitude - Teamwork

experience.first-job-description: I am in charge of taking care of the supply and logistics of the business, closing the box, maintaining a comfortable environment for the whole team, and meeting the objectives that the position requires of me.
experience.second-job-description: I did work from the production side (milanesa, hamburgers, chorizos, black pudding) butchering, counter assembly and customer service.
